name: ax-log-activity
description: Collects and sends log messages to a configured service.

logging.description: Specifies if and how log messages should be collected and sent.

enabled.description: Tells if log processing should be performed at all.

requestPolicy.description: Specifies if the messages are pushed as an array or each message on its own

threshold.description: Specifies how often to publish collected log messages.

seconds.description: The maximum number of seconds to keep log messages before publishing them.

messages.description: The maximum number of log messages to gather before publishing them.
